hero.badge: New: Zero commission for the first 3 months!
hero.title: Grow Your Business with Our Seller Marketplace
hero.subtitle: Join thousands of sellers who trust our platform to reach millions of customers nationwide. Easy setup, secure payments, and 24/7 support.

preview.title: Manage Everything in One Place
preview.subtitle: Our powerful seller dashboard gives you full control over your inventory, orders, and finances from any device.

features.title: Why Sell With Us?
features.sub: Everything you need to scale your store.

list.title: Nationwide Reach
list.desc: Access customers from every corner of the country instantly.

list.title: Secure Payments
list.desc: Guaranteed payouts directly to your bank or mobile money.

list.title: Analytics Dashboard
list.desc: Track sales, inventory, and customer insights in real-time.

list.title: Marketing Tools
list.desc: Boost your products with our built-in promotion engine.

steps.title: Start Selling in 3 Steps
steps.s1_d: Sign up with your business details and ID verification.
steps.s2_d: Upload photos, set prices, and manage inventory.
steps.s3_d: Receive orders and ship to customers effortlessly.
